Our Doctors
Here you can check all our doctors and their specialities
# Doctor Email Speciality
{{i+1}} {{doctor.name}} {{doctor.email}} {{doctor.speciality}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-doctors-page', templateUrl: './doctors-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./doctors-page.component.scss'] }) export class DoctorsPageComponent implements OnInit { doctors1 = [ { name:'Peter Parker', email:'p.parker@gmail.com', speciality:'Spiderman' }, { name:'Steven Strange', email:'steven.strange@marvel.com', speciality:'Surgeon' }, ]; doctors : any; constructor(private http: HttpClient ){ } ngOnInit(): void { this.http.get(''); } }
